net.automatalib.modelcheckers.ltsmin

Interface LTSminDFA<I,R>

  • Type Parameters:
    I - the input type.
    R - the type of a counterexample
    All Superinterfaces:
    LTSmin<I,DFA<?,I>,R>, ModelChecker<I,DFA<?,I>,String,R>, ModelChecker.DFAModelChecker<I,String,R>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LTSminLTLDFA, LTSminMonitorDFA

    public interface LTSminDFA<I,R>
extends LTSmin<I,DFA<?,I>,R>, ModelChecker.DFAModelChecker<I,String,R>
    A model checker using LTSmin for DFAs. An important feature of this DFAModelChecker, is that it will check if a given DFA hypothesis is prefix-closed.

    Another important feature is that rejecting states are NOT part of the LTS. This avoids the need for an unconditional fairness constraint in LTL formulae.

    Author:
    Jeroen Meijer
    See Also:
    DFAs.isPrefixClosed(DFA, Alphabet)
